english.segment1: [Verse 1:]. Each and every day I will seek your face. My soul is crying out. For more, I want more of You. I won't be satisfied nor content of where I am. So I will apprehend til I'm captured by what I'm after
english.segment2: [Bridge:]. And I will go. From faith to faith. From glory to glory. [Repeat]
english.segment3: [Chorus:]. And I'll forever be chasing after you. I'll be chasing after you. [Repeat]
english.segment4: [Verse 2:]. I will press towards the mark. For the prize, and I won't faint. There's one thing I desire and that's what I'm going for. I can't continue life, day by day, growing dry. I want to be with you (Jesus) and I'll seek where you are
english.segment5: [Bridge:]. And I will go. From faith to faith. From glory to glory. [X3]
english.segment6: [Chorus:]. And I'll forever be chasing after you. I'll be chasing after you [x7]
english.segment7: And I will go. From faith to faith. From glory to glory [x3]
